allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add OSRM routing, route caching, and lock screen overlay

- Add OsrmRoutingService for online route calculation via OSRM API
- Add RouteCacheService for session-based route caching with validation
- Implement lock screen overlay with PIN entry on app resume
- Update TripNavigationService with route calculation priority system
- Update navigation documentation with architecture details
EOF
)")
